mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( userInfo_id, name, price, content, stock, upload_date ) VALUES ( #{productDto.userInfoId}, #{productDto.name}, #{productDto.price}, #{productDto.content}, #{productDto.stock}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, u.name as 'username', p.name, p.price, p.content, p.stock, p.upload_date FROM product p INNER JOIN userInfo u ON p.userInfo_id = u.id
